entries.allies_arrived: Our fighter squadron has arrived. Join up as fast as you can.
entries.allies_remain: Rebel Pilot: < Phew that was a close one! Alright, now I just need to shake this...ack! Nooo... >
entries.allies_win: Good job, pull back for a breather. The bomber squadron will take it from here.
entries.battle_started: It's time men, give them all you got!
entries.enemies_arrived: Your task here is to pave the way for our bombers through their fighters.
entries.enemies_remain: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show enemy target terminated. %DI enemy targets remain. >
entries.enemies_win: I'm giving the bombers an abort order. We are taking too heavy losses!
entries.found_loc: Proceed to these coordinates pilot. The rest of the squadron will meet you there.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: These are the coordinates of attack. The rest of the squadron will meet you close to this location. Make your way there with haste.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: With the rest of the squadron, take out the fighter defense of the Imperial space station so that our bombers can make it through.
entries.quest_location_d: We are not sure why the Empire has such a large part of their navy stationed in the Endor system but it makes it a dangerous place for us. It's our hope that there's so many of them here because they are manufacturing these new advanced TIE's in this system.
entries.split_quest_alert: General Ufwol: < I have intel data incoming, stand by for further orders. >
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: General Ufwol: < Blast! The Empire has launched a bomber wing toward one of our frigates that are trying to pull out of the area. Stand by for new orders. >
entries.titleu: Endor system: Defeat Imperial space station guard.
entries.title_d: Unfortunately examining the stolen TIE Oppressor didn't give us any useful information about its origin. A lot of these new prototype ships have been deployed in the Endor system though so it's our suspicion that they may be manufactured there. We are about to launch an attack on one of the Imperial outposts in the system and Crimson Phoenix have been ordered to help clean out the base defensive fighters.
entries.title: Endor system: Defeat Imperial space station guard.
